type: Tutorial Step - Let's Start With 5 Bucks!

definition.text: The default initialBalance is set to 5 USDT, which is the minimum transaction size supported by the exchange.

paragraphs.text: The initialBalance is defined in the configuration of the Session Quoted Asset. Check it out and decide for yourself if you wish to change it!
There is no need to change the configuration to complete this tutorial, but you're free to do so if you wish!
